fullText: The show is less a traditional musical than a jukebox concert with some connecting tissue, but when that tissue is as flimsy as it is here, you're left with little more than a very expensive karaoke night.
dtliExcerpt: The show is less a traditional musical than a jukebox concert with some connecting tissue, but when that tissue is as flimsy as it is here, you're left with little more than a very expensive karaoke night.

keyPhrases.quote: connecting tissue is as flimsy as it is here
little more than a very expensive karaoke night

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic dismisses the show as having flimsy structure and compares it unfavorably to expensive karaoke, indicating clear rejection of the production. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong disappointment with the show's quality, comparing it unfavorably to a karaoke night, indicating a clear rejection of the production.
